item.title: About
item.author: kaanbasal@outlook.com (Kaan Basal)
item.description: I like designing stuff and making it alive. It might be a 3D printable object, things like wood & metal graving, or a software. If you would like to see more about the software part and what I have done so far, you can find my resume here.
